        <u_project_name display_value="AYO GRC Project">61ea7392c308221052237405e40131d5</u_project_name>
        <u_project_work>AYO project
- Created dashboard to display the incidents of the GRC
-There is already a dashboard is existing in a dashboard with Same name so come up with a problem of whether need to create a new dashboard or to modify the existing dashboard
-so changed to next story to setup a template for all notification for the GRC data and request acess
-Done with the development part 
-Found a problem with the flow in testing so cant test today forwarded to tommorow.

ITC Edwards
1. NOW-1596(TMTT Flow Development) - Tested the flow, corrected errors, created new reminder notifications and event, sent for peer review to Souvik

nowLearning
-CMDB fundamentals - 25%</u_project_work>
        <u_remarks/>
        <u_resourse display_value="Amal Madhav">5a8898a98381e650a946f896feaad37d</u_resourse>
        <u_start_time>2025-03-25 06:30:25</u_start_time>
        <u_work_notes/>
    </u_project_effort>
</record_update>
